Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package view.screens

Interface ScreenFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLIScreenFactory, GUIScreenFactory
    public interface ScreenFactory
    Factory Interface for building concrete Screen (factory pattern)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      • getBoardScreen

        Screen getBoardScreen​(java.lang.String activePlayer,
                      java.util.List<Player> players,
                      java.util.List<Coordinate> preHighlightedCoordinates)
        Creates a new concrete instance of BoardScreen
        Parameters:
        activePlayer - The username of the active player
        players - A list of all players object representing players in the game
        preHighlightedCoordinates - A list of pre highlighted coordinates
        Returns:
        A new instance of BoardScreen
